body:
Indeed, #7578
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Distributions.cpp#L152-L153
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Distributions.cpp#L143
Ah, sorry, it actually originally some time in march, 7578 just preserved this behavior. 
Turns out it is an artefact of tensor-variable merge. bernoulli_ for variable has always been this bad, and after tensor-variable merge only this bad  implementation remained.
